title: S4 Ep7: State v. Greg Lance – Episode 4 – The Murder Weapon
itunes:title: State v. Greg Lance – Episode 4 – The Murder Weapon
description:
September 30, 2019 / Investigators find a slew of bullets at the Heron farm in an unlikely manner and send then to be tested against the gun found on the Bohannon property and the bullets found at the victims home. And they desperately try to connect Greg Lance to the weapon itself
 
Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions and Spencer Burdette.
 
This episode was sponsored by Mejuri.
 
www.Mejuri.com/Undisclosed
